title: encoding/json Unmarshal don't support string to float64 like ".17"
body:
When I use json  Unmarshal a string to float64, the string like ".17",  and I tag the field  like this `json:,string`, and then the unmarshal will error cause it can't parse this to number. But the strconv.ParseFloat can parse this number.

So can you fix this problem?add ".17" into your regex and can make ParseFloat to parse this to 0.17
